Create a new ClubJudge Event.

Example

curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST / -d '{ \ "name": "Awesome Party", \ "venueId": 221, \ "startsAt": "2016-05-14T23:00:00", \ "endsAt": "2016-05-15T04:00:00", \ "flyerGuid": '5e7c80d0-f977-417d-bcb2-77fd6c7020bc', \ "musicGenreIds": [1], \ "tickets": [{ \ "name": "door sale", \ "cents": 1000, \ "currency": "EUR", \ "url": "http://tibbaa.com" \ }], \ "artistIds": [1] \ }' \ https://bifrost.clubjudge.com/v2/events.json
